title: Zombie Off 2: Revelation
description: Chemcorp has fallen. Morrow and Jamison are gone. Now, Connor and his friends, Doug and Diana, find themselves with the formula for creating ZOMBIE OFF, the product that can turn the tide of the zombie apocalypse. But one key piece of the puzzle is missing, and there’s only one place to find it. Returning to the devil’s den, the three weary companions find far more than they bargained for, and make a discovery that changes everything.
author: Scott   Lee
